entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: awasthi122/chrome-extension: Perception AI – Chrome Extension Perception AI is a lightweight Chrome extension powered by GPT-4 that allows users to ask any question and get instant, AI-generated responses. It integrates the GPT-4 API using RapidAPI and provides a clean, responsive UI built with React and Tailwind CSS.
entry.content: Perception AI – Chrome Extension Perception AI is a lightweight Chrome extension powered by GPT-4 that allows users to ask any question and get instant, AI-generated responses. It integrates the GPT-4 API using RapidAPI and provides a clean, responsive UI built with React and Tailwind CSS.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
